name: vince
description: Vince is a self-hosted privacy-first web analytics platform similar to Plausible. It tracks visits without cookies and provides clear charts and metrics via a minimal dashboard.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Track website visits without cookies or personal data collection

features.title: Simple Dashboard
features.description: View traffic metrics in a clean, minimal dashboard without complexity

features.title: Page Views
features.description: Monitor page views, unique visitors, and bounce rates for your websites

features.title: Referrer Tracking
features.description: See where visitors come from with referrer and UTM parameter tracking

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Use a tiny tracking script that doesn't impact page load performance

features.title: Real-Time
features.description: View current visitor activity and traffic in real-time

features.title: Multiple Sites
features.description: Track multiple websites from a single installation with separate dashboards

features.title: No Cookie Banners
features.description: Avoid GDPR cookie consent requirements with cookieless tracking
